name: Case Management
description: Golden Gate Regional Center (GGRC) case managers help families and individuals make informed decisions about their own needs and desires in regards to a developmental disability. They are knowledgeable about the resources, services and supports an individual with developmental disabilities (or a family served by Early Start) may want or need. The case manager is the primary partner of any individual or family receiving services from Golden Gate Regional Center.

howToGetIt: Phone: 1-888-339-3305 Fax: 1-888-339-3306 Email: intake@ggrc.org Mail: 1900 S. Norfolk Street, Suite 100, San Mateo, CA 94403 (ATTN: Intake Unit)
